nodes.text: The YV series was a series of light freighters put out by Corellian Engineering Corporation. They were intended to be a replacement line to the YT-series, but were not anywhere near as successful.

Most ships in the YV series had tall, long, and narrow hulls with the cockpit on the top and two large maneuvering fins at the back, near the engines. However, at least two of the models incorporated the disc-like shape of the YT series.
